content: description a cheery spin on a classic granny square fit for the whole fam perfectly sized for a baby and works brilliantly as a cozy lap blanket for kiddos to adult toss it in your bag to keep the chill at bay for those cold mornings heading to school or at the movies where it gets brrr available on my blog www whistleandwool com/blog/rainbow-daze-blanket available as a kit with lion brand yarn https //shrsl com/32t9b notes >please see my youtube for pattern/stitch tutorials www youtube com/@whistleandwool >beginning chain counts as a stitch >worked in the round from the center working outwards >the granny pattern of 3dcs is worked between each group of 3dcs to form clusters buy 2 patterns get 2 free- add all 4 to your cart pattern sizes baby blanket works perfectly as a lap blanket for the whole fam though skill level beginner lion brand yarns color a baby mandala in narnia #3 590yd/540 5 3oz/150g color b made with love in lychee/white #4 185yd/169m 3 5 oz/100g skeins needed a 2 color b 1 more cozy designs https //www whistleandwool com be cozy be kind i n s t a g r a m @whistleandwool copyright restrictions ***these patterns are copyright of whistle and wool© so you may not copy alter adjust share record redistribute or resell my pattern you also do not have permission to use any of my photos
